article.title: Center for Excellence in Management Education at Western Washington University
article.summary: Learn about student project opportunities at the Center for Excellence in Management Education at Western Washington University.
article.content:
​​​​

The Center for Excellence in Management Education at WWU offers a variety of different programs to connect students with leaders in the business community. These include Leadership Lunch Program, Virtual Mentor, and a Speaker Series. For additional information:http://www.cbe.wwu.edu/deptHome.asp?dept=CEME.
article.seometadatatitle: Center for Excellence in Management Education at Western Washington University
article.seometadatadescription: Learn about student project opportunities at the Center for Excellence in Management Education at Western Washington University.
